EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Discover Destinations is a premier travel agent based in Atlanta, GA. With over 100 years of combined travel experience in the travel industry. We have differentiated ourselves by providing fast, affordable, & desirable travel arrangements, such as hotel accommodation, transportation, airline tickets, and large arrangement of events. With our purchasing power and relationships with hotels, restaurants, and airlines rest assured you are getting competitive pricing.

CORE COMPETENCIES
  •      Hotel room block management
  •       Audio/visual service
  •      Ground transportation
  •       Food & beverage planning
  •     Airline booking & ticketing
  •       Onsite assistance w/ registration
  •     Event & meeting planning
  •       Group travel

CONTACT INFORMATION

Discover Destinations

3883 Rogers Bridge Rd #701, Duluth, GA 30097

404-333-8686 office

404-585-5000 fax

sales@discover-destinations.com

www.discover-destinations.com
